articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets set for recovery on revived Fed cut hopes after bruising tech losses last week - CNBC
articles.description: Fed funds futures are currently pricing in a more than 70% chance of a quarter percentage point cut, according to the CME FedWatch tool.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets were mixed Monday after New York Federal Reserve President John Williams signaled a third rate cut was a possibility this year.
On Friday, Williams suggested the Fed could lower… [+1747 chars]
